data.name: HELLIST
data.detailed_description:
Discord


About the Game

HELLIST is an isekai indie game based in Heaven and Hell.

Play as a 7-year old girl who got sent to Hell.

You remember nothing but your name, Aka.

Why were you sent to Hell? What atrocious sin did you commit?

Journey as you uncover your past, as well as the hidden lies and conspiracies surrounding Heaven and Hell.

Meet and ally up with interesting characters, such as a gopnik, a nun and a 10-month old baby - but what is a baby doing in Hell? Such reality is cruel.

Hunt down evil beings, become stronger, level up, get new items, learn new skills and make some friends in Heaven & Hell along the way!

Game is in early development, will probably take a few years to finish, but you can Playtest it now by clicking on the "Request Access" button!

data.short_description: HELLIST is an isekai rogue-like indie game based in Heaven and Hell. It's in early development, click "Request Access" to instantly begin play testing and give feedback!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: - Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system - Other configuration and user environment as provided by default with the supported distribution (Kernel, Compositor, etc.) - Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver
